channel.title: Home on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hugo-Sewing Introduction
item.description: Hugo-Sewing is a simple, clean, and flexible Hugo theme suitable for personal blogs, academic websites, and group websites. Background Hugo-Sewing is heavily based on Hugo-Xmin, with modifications mainly inspired by Shayan Hosseini’s website, Hugo-Astatine-Theme, and Hugo-Holy: The base of Hugo-ht is Yihui Xie’s Hugo-Xmin. The academic layout (“Home”, “Project”, “Publication”, and “People”) is modified the code from Shayan Hosseini’s website by Shayan Hosseini and Hugo-Astatine-Theme by Hugo Cisneros The visual styles (navigation, index list, and footer) based on the Hugo-Holy theme by SerKo.

item.title: Hugo-Sewing Shortcodes
item.description: Reference https://fourxiajiao.github.io/2022/hugo-blog/ https://www.sleepymoon.cyou/2023/hugo-shortcodes/ Spotify 1 usage < spotify type="track" id="6DJ3dfsY7fOU161ZMjzWIH" height="80px"> // please use double {{ }} 2 showing Mark 1 usage {< mark text="Mark!" >} // please use double {{ }} 2 showing Mark! Abbreviation 1 usage {< abbr title="real test" text="this shortcodes can only show on PC" >} // please use double {{ }} 2 showing this shortcodes can only show on PC Toggle 1 usage < toggle "Toggle" > Suprise!

item.title: Hugo-Sewing Markdown Style
item.description: Reference https://hugo-ht.vercel.app/cn/2021/01/07/first-post-cn/ H1 Markdown Style H2 Markdown Style H3 Markdown Style H4 Markdown Style H5 Markdown Style H6 Markdown Style List Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Table Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Water Footnotes What I cannot create, I do not understand1. — Richard Feynman Quotes Je memos, donc je suis. — René Descartes fans Je memos, donc je suis.
